education.institution: University of British Columbia, Vancouver, BC, Canada

highlights: Developed, updated and maintained back-end REST API routes utilized by the mobile app for10,000+ active users using Type-Script, MySQL and AWS services.
Improved back-end endpoints to allow for featured and verified professional user badges while adding integration and unit tests to the CI/CD pipeline ensuring no code debt is added

Introduced an extra layer of security for firmware versions by having Lambda functions trigger staff emails when firmware production flags are set to true via the back-end using AWS Lambda and AWS SES
Implemented a Database Job Queue system which resolved critical issues regarding high CPU consumption during peak processing hours, massively reducing server crashing occurrences by 100%
Revitalized platform by designing the front and back-end of an Optical Character Recognition(OCR) system using Google Tesseract responsible for processing 30,000+ user documents per annual quarter
Proposed and prototyped a Twilio Client and REST API that allows for communication with the web platform through SMS text using Node.JS with Ngrok.io, Express.JS and Twilio NPM Modules

volunteer.summary: Cadet Instructor and Flight Commander of Hurricane Flight
highlights: Managed a flight of approximately 30 cadets, ensuring attendance, uniform standards and general standards were met
Assisted Officers in running activities and parades

volunteer.summary: Vice President of the Music Department
highlights: Managed and catalyzed brainstorming, planning and running of events within the music department to promote the student experience
Oversaw and managed the set-up, take-down and intermission of concerts
Assisted nursing staff in providing companionship and giving aid to residents in the care home
Provided visits in addition to conversing with residents

awards.title: British Columbia Government BC Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: BC Achievement Scholarships recognize the top 8,000 graduates in the province.
